1.0.3.en: Fixed 'Set mode' problems with flow cards

1.0.4.en: Changed Mill endpoint, fixed problems where heaters couldn't be reinstalled after being deleted and fixed problems with flow cards

1.0.6.en: Added support for Energy (may require re-pairing if device is added prior to version 1.0.6) and fixed issues with flows with multiple devices

1.0.7.en: Improved logging and Mill API validation

1.0.9.en: Added support for energy usage from cloud
